doc.field: Gay USA, Vol. XV, Episode No. 16, QPTV Queens New York
Gay USA, Vol. XV, Episode No. 16, QPTV Queens New York
1. Lesbian and Gay News: Andy Humm and Ann Northrop discuss recent general events that relate to the LGBT community.
COMMERCIAL: Trailer for film "Love! Valour! Compassion!"
2. Interview: Diego Santiago, President of the Puerto Rican Initiative to Develop Empowerment, discusses new Puerto Rican governmental laws affecting people with HIV/AIDS.
3. AIDS News. Includes commercial for Home Access, HIV testing.

4. "Lambda Update": Ruth Harlow, Managing Attorney for Lambda Legal Defense and Education Fund, introduces Jon Davidson, Western Regional Office Supervising Attorney, speaking on the settlement of the Pete Mackler police brutality case.
5. Footage of protest [by the Anti-Violence Project] at Cobble Hill Nursing Home regarding treatment of nurse's aide [Vicky Cruz], who is transgender.
6. "Ellen News": Updates on Ellen DeGeneres, and other entertainment.
7. Interview: Michelangelo Signorile, author, discusses his book "Life Outside - The Signorile Report on Gay Men: Sex, Drugs, Muscles, and the Passages of Life".
